features: This Graco stroller turns your Graco SnugRide infant car seat into an ultra portable travel solution and is the only car seat carrier engineered exclusively for Graco SnugRide infant car seats ; Height adjustable handle for comfortable strolling
Ultra lightweight aluminum car seat stroller frame is the perfect infant car seat accessory, providing convenience on the go ; Meets Disney Size Requirements
Car seat travel cart works with all Graco SnugRide infant car seats (stroller is not compatible with convertible, 3-in-1, or 4-in-1 car seats).
One hand, standing fold with automatic storage lock, means no bending necessary. Parent's tray with 2 deep cup holders for on-the-go convenience

Extra large storage basket with zippered pocket securely holds your travel essentials ; All wheel suspension for a smooth ride on any surface with single front swivel wheels for enhanced maneuverability
body.description: Product Description Simply click in your favorite Graco infant car seat and go! The SnugRider Elite turns your favorite infant car seat into an ultra-portable travel solution & is the only car seat carrier engineered exclusively for Graco car seats. Compatible with all Graco Classic Connect and Click Connect infant car seats. Brand Story By Graco

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Graco SnugRider Elite Infant Car Seat Frame Stroller All-wheel suspension for a smooth ride on any surface with single front swivel wheels for enhanced maneuverability Height-adjustable handle for comfortable strolling This ultra-lightweight aluminum stroller frame is the perfect infant car seat accessory One-hand, standing fold with automatic storage lock Extra-large storage basket with zippered pocket securely holds your travel essentials

About us For over 60 years, the Graco brand has provided thoughtful, practical and dependable parenting solutions to generations of families. Our approach to caregiving stems from a heritage of innovation designed around safety, durability and the best intentions of loving parents. We know that the smallest things can make the biggest difference in taking care of your baby. That’s why everything we design is intuitive and easy to operate, giving you more time to focus on what really matters most, your little one. Our products are built to assist and enhance the parenting experience, lending every parent a helping hand and peace of mind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would recommend - convenient, lightweight
reviews.reviewText: I would highly recommend this product. The ability to click the car seat into the stroller is extremely convenient. It’s lightweight which is nice for folding/unfolding it, lifting it in and out of a car, and pushing it easily. If you’re worried about picking the right stroller, you can’t go wrong with this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We purchased this Graco SnugRider car seat stroller base in November of 2023. It is amazing! Easy to assemble and lightweight. The car seat pops in just as easily as it attaches to the base in the vehicle. Best of all it has the one-handed fold when you are ready to put it away. It also stores standing upright. I would 100% recommend this to a friend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best idea for a stroller
reviews.reviewText: I am so happy wit h this stroller due to the easy of setting it up, durability, and mobility of the stroller. It matches with our car seat so all I have to do is take the car seat off the base in my car and click it into the stroller. I love that I can do this one handed and that it is a breeze when I am out with my baby by myself. It can be steered with one hand and also set up with one hand as there is a release button that is pushed and then unfolded. Similarly it can easily be folded and fits in my backseat behind the passenger side seat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This stroller is great if you already have a car seat, just pop it in place and you’re ready to go. Folds down slim very quickly and lightweight for easy travel. There’s a basket on bottom for your baby bag and essentials needed while on the go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient and low cost
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this stroller for the past month now and am extremely pleased with this purchase. I was needing something to make outings easier, rather than having to lug my LO around in her car seat. It’s extremely lightweight and opens/closes easily. I was going back and forth between purchasing something like this and spending the money on a Doona. I’m glad I went with this carseat/stroller combo, and that I am still able to utilize my Graco car seat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is absolutely great! Very lightweight, folds easily, and is extremely easy to steer, even one handed if needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love how compact this mini stroller is! Perfect for doctors visits or when I don’t feel like lugging the full sized stroller.Super lightweight and easy to use, good quality and completely worth my money.Only thing I wish was different is the storage compartment on the bottom. My baby bag barely fits, I have to jam it in and it’s hard to pull out quickly when I need something.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight - perfect for day trips
reviews.reviewText: We have a jogger stroller that is way too heavy for me to lug without my husband - so I wanted something that was more practical for my trips without him. This was the ticket. So easy to unfold and carders fits perfectly. Only have been using for about a month but so far so good!

As a FTM, you don't usually have a lot of extra time when caring for a newborn so the fact that I'm taking the time to write this review means that it's worth it. This is our second Graco stroller - we also have a jogger which we love, but is quite bulky if you're just going to do errands or need extra space in the trunk when travelling - so we decided to purchase this one as it claimed to be light, can be opened/closed with one hand and is compatible with all Graco click connect carseats. I would say it met all of those requirements and more! It surprisingly has good suspension (disclaimer: I haven't owned it very long so I'm not sure if this lasts, but again I won't be using it on everyday walks since we have the jogger) and most importantly, it was easy to assemble - everything just *clicks* into place!The only cons I would say is that:1) It took a few tries before getting the hang of opening and closing it (the release button jammed so we had to wriggle it a few times and reinstall the tray) and2) It's for infants, so we probably won't be using it for very long once our daughter no longer fits in her infant carseat. But.. for the price and convenience of having something more compact for our needs it's well worth it IMO so don't wait out on this stroller!
Es fácil de ajustar y transportar, se convierte en carreola y práctico para no tener dos artículos.

I love this, I wish I bought this with my first child instead of a travel system. It’s so convenient, small, compact, easy to put together, easy to carry, fold down. Use up to your infant is out of the infant car seat.
LoveLove love this stroller!Very easy to assemble and use.Lightweight and compatible with any Graco car seat! A must have !
